name: Plum, Red Grape and Almond Smoothie
description: I decided to combine red grapes and plums here because of how well plums and wine go together in desserts. (I wasn’t about to attempt a red wine smoothie, but I hope this recipe inspires some daring mixologists.)
keywords: almond meal, black or red grapes, plum, healthy, vegan, vegetarian, summer
recipeIngredient: 2 1/2 small or 2 large plums, pitted and sliced about 3/4 cup sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Place all of the ingredients in a blender and blend until frothy, about one minute.
